revision.text:
'''Level editing''' is a broad topic, which includes the creation and modification of maps and scripts. This page serves as a gateway to various topics about level editing.
==General== * [[ACS|ACS reference]] * [[Standard editor numbers]] * [[Strife dialogue scripts]] * [[Editing tools#Level editors|Level editors]] * [[Action specials|Line and ACS action specials]] * [[Particles|Particles]] * [[Sector specials]] * [[Thing executed specials|Thing specials and alternate triggers]] * [[Tutorials]] * [[WAD structure]]
==Editing tricks== * [[Classes:SecurityCamera|Security cameras]] * [[Classes:PatrolPoint|Patrol points]] * [[Floor/Ceiling sector translations]] * [[Stacked sectors]] * [[Tutorials]] * [[Classes:Decal|Using the Decal thing]] [[Category:Editing concepts]]
